maqras.text: 84|1|nowpel del mekh trauv ban bekbak .
84|2|haey vea ban sdabbangkeab  ning brate b tde tam mcheasa robsa vea .
84|3|haey nowpel del phendei trauv ban leatasanthung .
84|4|haey vea ban b po  ch nh nouv avei del mean nowknong khluon robsa vea  haey thveu aoy tte saat .
84|5|haey vea ban sdabbangkeab  ning brate b tde tam mcheasa robsa vea .
84|6|ao mnoussa lok.  pitabrakd nasa  anak kuchea anak del kham  broengobreng sang champoh mcheasa robsa anak( tohchea ampeula  ryy akrak)  anak nung chuob trong cheaminkhan( now thngai barlok) .
84|7|haey chamnek e anak del trauv ban ke brakl sievphow  kamntheto robsa ke now daisda
84|8|ke nung trauv ttuol nouv kar katsechakdei yeang ngeayosruol bamphot .
84|9|haey ke nung trauv tralb towkean kruosaear robsa ke vinh daoy  sechakdeirikreay kraileng .
84|10|rie anak del trauv ban ke brakl nouv sievphow robsa ke now  dai che  v ng pikraoyokhnang robsa ke
84|11|ke nung srek danghoy tha  vineasa a nd reay haey khnhom .
84|12|haey ke nung chaul knong phleung nork del cheh yeang santho  santhow .
84|13|pitabrakd nasa  ke thleab rsanow knong lokey cheamuoynung  krom kruosaear robsa ke yeang sabbayrikreay .
84|14|pitabrakd nasa  ke ban kitthea  ke nung min trauv vilotralb ( towkean a l laoh) vinh laey .
84|15|min dauchnaoh te.  pitabrakd nasa  mcheasa robsa ke doeng bamphot  champoh roubke .
84|16|dau che  neah  yeung sbath nung pelothngai rieb lich .
84|17|ning peloyb  ning avei del ban bramoulophdom .
84|18|ning preah chnt nowpel del vea ban reah penhovng .
84|19|puok anak nung vivodd pi damnakkal muoy tow damnakkal muoy ( nowknong lokey) .
84|20|dau che  neah  tae mean rueng ei  v tow ban chea puokke kmean chomnue
84|21|haey nowpel del mean ke sautr kompir kuor an aoy puokke sdab puokke min saou chout laey .
84|22|min tebonnaoh  puok del kmean chomnue themtang bdeseth  tiet phng .
84|23|haey a l laoh doeng bamphot nouv avei del puokke leak touk now  knong chetd .
84|24|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) brab puokke ampi tearounakamm  da sen chhucheab choh .
84|25|leuklengte banda anak del mean chomnue ning ban sang ampeula troemotrauv bonnaoh .  puokke nung ttuol ban phalbony daoy it  konnea .
85|1|a l laoh sbath nung mekh del mean phkay cheachraen .
85|2|ning thngai del ban sanyea( thngai barlok) .
85|3|ning anak del thveusaeaksaei  haeyning phosdo tang teanglay del  ke yk mk bangheanh .
85|4|ke ban dakbandasa champoh krom au kh tout( chea puok del chik  rondaw samleab anak mean chomnue) .
85|5|chea rondaw phleung del mean kamnat ausa
85|6|khn del puokke angkouy now choumvinh rondaw phleung noh
85|7|daoy puokke samlung meul towleu avei del puokke kampoung br pru td  towleu banda anak del mean chomnue .
85|8|haey puokke ban thveubeab banda anak del mean chomnue  ku daoy  sar te puokke mean chomnue leu a l laoh da mha khlangpouke ning chea ti kaotasarsaer .
85|9|kuchea anak del mean karokrobkrong mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei .  haey a l laoh  kuchea saksaei towleu avei  teangoasa .

85|10|pitabrakd nasa  puok del dot banda anak del mean chomnue brosasrei  banteabmk puokke minban sarphap tosakamhosa ( champoh a l laoh) te noh  puokke nung trauv ttuol tearounakamm nowknong  nork cheu han nam  ning ttuol tearounakamm del chabcheh yeang chhucheab  bamphot .

85|11|pitabrakd nasa  banda anak del mean chomnue  ning ban sang ampeula troemotrauv noh  puokke nung ttuol ban thansuokr del mean t ne  l  cheachraen haur pi kraom vea .  noh kuchea chokchy da thomtheng .
85|12|pitabrakd nasa  tearounakamm nei mcheasa robsa anak ku khlangokla  bamphot .
85|13|pitabrakd nasa  trong kuchea anak del bangkeut  ning chea anak thveu aoy rsa laengvinh .
85|14|haey trong mha aphytosa  mha anet sraleanh .
85|15|mcheasa nei a r sh da thkomthkaeng .
85|16|chea mcheasa del thveuteam avei del trong mean chetnea .
85|17|tae rueng robsa kangtp ban mokadl anak( mou ham meat) ryyte
85|18|( dauchchea) hvie r aon  ning sa mou d .
85|19|phtoytowvinh  puok del kmean chomnue nowte pyeayeam  bdeseth .
85|20|haey a l laoh kuchea anak laomptth pi khangokraoy puokke ( doeng real  sakammopheap robsa puokke) .
85|21|phtoytowvinh  vea kuchea kompir kuor an da mha thkomthkaeng .
85|22|del mean nowknong sievphow kamnttra( lav ho l mah-  hvou sa) .
86|1|a l laoh sbath nung mekh  ning at t ri k .
86|2|haey avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  at t ri k chea avei noh
86|3|kuchea phkay del mean rosmei phluchenhchach .
86|4|bokkol krob  roub ku sotthote mean anak theroksaa ke .
86|5|dau che  neah  chaur aoy mnoussa lok meul choh tha  tae roubke trauv ban  bangkeut mk pi avei
86|6|roubke trauv ban bangkeut mk pi tuk del banh chenh( pi bradeab  phetborsa chaul tow knong bradeab phet sdrei)
86|7|del vea chenhpi chhaoengokhnang borsa  ning chhaoengchomni sdrei .
86|8|pitabrakd nasa  trong chea anak mean anoupheap knong kar thveu aoy  ke rsa laengvinh .
86|9|now thngai del athrkambang teangoasa trauv ban leatatradeang .
86|10|pelnoh ke kmean amnach  haeyka kmean anak chuoy der .
86|11|a l laoh sbath nung mekh del mean phlieng thleak mdong haey  mdongtiet .
86|12|ning phendei del meankar be  reah bek( daoysaar roukkhcheate  loutleasa) .
86|13|pitabrakd nasa  vea( kompir kuor an) kuchea peakyapech  del mean karbengchek( rveang khosa ning trauv) .
86|14|haey kompir kuor an  ka minmen samreab lengsaech der .
86|15|pitabrakd nasa  puokke riebcham lbichakl akrak(daembi  brachheang nung mou ham meat) .
86|16|haey yeung ka mean phenkar( daembi tabt nung puokke)vinh  der .
86|17|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) ponyearpel aoy puok kmean chomnue  ning rngcham meul puokke muoy ry sen choh .
